wikipedia_page.main: Watkin William Price, usually referred to as W. W. Price (4 September 1873 – 31 December 1967) was a notable local historian, schoolmaster and political activist at Aberdare, South Wales.

response: *31 December – Watkin William Price, historian and activist, 94

*Watkin William Price, M.A., (1873–1967), Aberdare, BAILEY , Sir JOSEPH ( 1783 - 1858 ), baronet, iron-master, landowner, and M.P. Dictionary of Welsh Biography, National Library of Wales, 2009 Honourable Society of Cymmrodorion, Welsh Biography Online
